WorkItem.Description:
Hello there,

I'm using your project in an application where my users are able to generate bunch of code through an user-friendly GUI. Even it's work really fine, I just got a little "bug" (well, I know it's not a real bug) with specials characters like thoses ones : ' " < > # etc. Thoses characters are interpreted like in HTML-code (< > etc.) like form, however it's not an awaited behavior.

So, here's my question : is there a way inside RazorEngine to disable this behavior, or should I handle with a method it in my template ?


Thanks for reading. Please excuse me for potential english mistakes.
